Package resumebasegradle.net.illay.resumebase.rest

Class ResumeRestController

java.lang.Object
resumebasegradle.net.illay.resumebase.rest.ResumeRestController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1/resume/")
public class ResumeRestController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller-class designed to directly process requests from the client and return results
Version:
1.0
Author:
illay
